Key Match Events: Suriname took an early lead through Djevencio van der Kust in the 18th minute.
Omari Glasgow scored a penalty goal in the 43rd minute after van der Kust brought down Isaiah Jones.
Jaden Montnor scored the second goal for Suriname in the 66th minute with a shot that beat Quillan Roberts.
Virgil Misidjan scored the third goal for Suriname in the 84th minute after Terrence Vancooten's miscue.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played with water breaks due to high temperatures.
Guyana's starting lineup included Quillan Roberts, Terence Vancooten, Reiss Greenidge, and Omari Glasgow.
Suriname's starting lineup featured Etienne Vaessen, Anfernee Dijksteel, and Virgil Misidjan.
Others: Guyana will face Martinique in their next match on September 9.
Suriname dominated most of the midfield play throughout the match.
